page.title: 14ANOTHER FAMILY WEEKEND
page.content: My name is Caroline Mills.Ilive near the school at Lower Church Farmhouse.On Saturdays we usually go to Bury to do some food shopping. When I get home I help mum to do the cooking.Sometimes my brother Nick helps mum too, but he makes a terrible mess and leaves mum to clear up.We sometimes go out to see our Nanny or Grandad.At Nanny's we have lunch and she always cooks our favourite lunch of pasties and sago pudding.In my spare time I usually have my best friend over.Her name is Katherine Greener.She and I play games like leap-frog,hide and seek,"it"and forty-forty.All these games we play in the garden but we also play other games that we have made up ourselves.In the evening Katherine goes home. Then I have my supper.After supper,I get ready for bed,clean my teeth and go to bed.
